select * from ( SELECT id, relation_id relationId, relation_name relationName FROM reservation_apply WHERE type = 0
UNION
SELECT r.id, ii.id relationId, ii.name relationName FROM reservation_apply r LEFT JOIN ins_class_type_relation icr on icr.class_type_id = r.relation_id LEFT JOIN institution_info ii on ii.id = icr.ins_id WHERE r.type = 1 )c GROUP BY c.relationId

select count(1) from ( SELECT r.id, r.mobile, r.relation_name insName, '' className, '' price, r.note, r.deal_status dealStatus, r.create_time createTime FROM reservation_apply r WHERE 1 = 1 AND type = 0 and r.relation_id = #{insId} and r.mobile = #{mobile} and r.deal_status = #{dealStatus} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") = STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},"%Y-%m-%d") AND DATE_FORMAT(r.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},"%Y-%m-%d") AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},"%Y-%m-%d")
UNION
SELECT r.id, r.mobile, ii.name insName, ct.name className, ct.price, r.note, r.deal_status dealStatus, r.create_time createTime FROM reservation_apply r LEFT JOIN ins_class_type ct ON ct.id = r.relation_id LEFT JOIN ins_class_type_relation icr ON ct.id = icr.class_type_id LEFT JOIN institution_info ii on ii.id = icr.ins_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND type = 1 and ii.id = #{insId} and ct.id = #{insClassId} and r.mobile = #{mobile} and r.deal_status = #{dealStatus} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") = STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},"%Y-%m-%d") AND DATE_FORMAT(r.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},"%Y-%m-%d") AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},"%Y-%m-%d")
) c ORDER BY c.createTime DESC
